Run

Ano: 2020

IMDb ID: tt8633478

Classificação: 6.7

Sinopse: Chloe, a teenage wheelchair user, is home schooled by her mother. However, her mother's strange behavior doesn't go unnoticed and when Chloe pries into some private papers, she discovers a Change of Name Certificate document with her mother's name, Diane Sherman, on it. When Chloe googles "Diane Sherman," the internet suddenly disconnects. Chloe becomes suspicious of all that her mother does, suspecting her of something sinister. She decides to go on the run in her wheelchair in a desperate attempt to get away from her.—yusufpiskin
